overview:
As Bizooki’s founding CEO, Andy Tabar brings over 10 years of experience with Internet technologies and was the 2006 and 2008 Regions Bank Outstanding Young Entrepreneur of the Year.

He is currently operating Bizooki full time, while expanding its operations in Nashville, Tennessee and Cleveland, Ohio. At Belmont, Tabar has been evolving Bizooki from a consulting business to a high growth venture.

He continues to be involved in international entrepreneurship conferences, including Delta Epsilon Chi and CEO, and was a speaker at the National Youth Leadership Forum on Technology in Silicon Valley. Tabar was one of ten national finalists in the 2008 Spirit of Entrepreneurship and Enterprise Development (S.E.E.D.) Forum in Santa Barbara, CA.

Also: 2nd Place at The New Venture Creation Competition in Indiana 3rd Place on Ideablob.com National Finalist at The International Entrepreneurship Academy National Finalist at The Entrepreneur Challenge (DEX)

external_links.title: Junior Entrepreneurship Major Competes for Two National Prizes
Small Business: From a Good Source
